text: Te ja che, jene tamarum sarjana mati vade, pachi tipam vade, pachi jamela lohi vade karyum, pachi tamane balakana rupamam janama ape che, pachi (tamaro vikasa kare che), tame pukhtavaye pahonci java, pachi vrd'dha bani java, tamara manthi ketalaka a pahelam ja mrtyu pame che, (te tamane chodi de che) jethi tame nakki karela samaya sudhi pahonci java ane jethi tame vicara kari lo
